tool_description: Its an api to access all the details like name species and image of all the characters of Light Novel Series Throne of Glass
title: Throne of Glass

api_list.name: Single Charcter
api_list.description:
It is to access details of a single character 
it will revert back name, species, and image source in single arrat format
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://throne-of-glass.p.rapidapi.com/api/characters/{id}"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "throne-of-glass.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())

api_list.name: All Characters
api_list.description: It is to access list of all characters
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://throne-of-glass.p.rapidapi.com/api/characters"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "throne-of-glass.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())
